import './loginregister.css' const Register = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [pass, setPass] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [role, setRole] = useState("user"); // default role const [isError, setisError] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState("Some Error Occured!") return (

Register

setName(e.target.value)} id="name" placeholder="Full Name" />
setEmail(e.target.value)} type="email" placeholder="youremail@gmail.com" id="email" name="email" />
setPass(e.target.value)} type="password" placeholder="********" id="password" name="password" />
{isError ? (
{error}
) : ( "" )}

) } export default Register;
